meanings.definition: To make or become three times as great or as many.
meanings.sent1: She was triplexing her savings by investing wisely.
meanings.sent2: The baker decided to try triplexing the recipe to make more cakes.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to be triplexing rabbits out of thin air!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, triplexing in intensity.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays were triplexing in the clear blue sky, creating a stunning display.

meanings.definition: A system of transmitting three separate signals simultaneously on a single cable or circuit.
meanings.sent1: The new technology allowed for efficient triplexing of data streams.
meanings.sent2: The engineer explained the benefits of using triplexing in telecommunications.
meanings.sent3: The triplexing of information made the old system seem outdated and slow.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed through the speakers, triplexing the sound quality.
meanings.sent5: The triplexing of signals ensured a smooth and uninterrupted broadcast.
